short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a simple button in Zendesk to copy the current ticket number

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension creates a simple button in Zendesk to copy the current ticket number. This saves time compared to copying it out of the URL.

This extension is open source on GitHub: https://github.com/MattParkerDev/ZendeskTicketCopy
